categories: Category:Star Wars Roleplaying Game (Fantasy Flight Games)

nodes.text: Star Wars Roleplaying, also known as the Star Wars Roleplaying Game, is a series of three cross–compatible roleplaying games produced by Fantasy Flight Games.
It consists of Star Wars: Edge of the Empire, Star Wars: Age of Rebellion, and Star Wars: Force and Destiny.

Additional Era sourcebooks compatible with all three RPGs have been released, including Dawn of Rebellion, Allies and Adversaries, Rise of the Separatists, Collapse of the Republic, Gadgets and Gear, and Starships and Speeders.
